description: The driver release many NVIDIA fans have been waiting on is here today. NVIDIA released the NVIDIA 555.42.02 Beta driver with some necessary upgrades for Wayland support.
title: NVIDIA 555.42.02 Beta driver out bringing Wayland explicit sync

description: King under the Mountain from developer Rocket Jump Technology, a simulation-based settlement-building strategy game, that was going through a big upgrade and re-brand with Mountaincore ended up shutting down and being open sourced.
title: King under the Mountain (Mountaincore) went open source as developer shuts

description: APICO is a chilled beekeeping sim from TNgineers that just got a little bit more industrious, with the free APICO 4.0 update giving you some fun new tools.
title: It's beeautiful! APICO 4.0 brings automation machines to the chilled beekeeping sim

description: As BKOM Studios approach the launch of Madzik - Episode 1, a narrative-driven hack and slash adventure with a nostalgic 80s vibe, they're giving away a Steam Deck OLED.
title: BKOM Studios developer on Madzik are giving away a Steam Deck OLED

description: Kingdom Two Crowns: Call of Olympus was just announced with a plan to launch later this year, expanding the side-scrolling micro strategy game into Ancient Greece.
title: Kingdom Two Crowns: Call of Olympus announced for this year

description: K-D Lab have revived their classic RTS, with PERIMETER: Legate Edition now available on Steam with full Native Linux support and it's even open source.
title: PERIMETER: Legate Edition released on Steam with Linux support

description: Love classic beat 'em up games? You're going to enjoy this latest Humble Bundle of games as there's some good picks inside it.
title: Beat 'em up with this Humble Bundle of games

description: Oh yay, more AI stuff. Intel have announced that Lunar Lake is due to arrive in Q3 2024 and it will include a neural processing unit (NPU) for AI fans.
title: Intel Lunar Lake arrives Q3 2024 as Intel jump more into AI

description: About damn time right? After being Epic Exclusive for multiple years, KINGDOM HEARTS is finally coming to Steam and there's a lot of it. This will make it so much easier to play on Steam Deck / Linux thanks to Proton.
title: The KINGDOM HEARTS games are finally coming to Steam in June
